original_title: Viva Ibiza! 2 : Sexy Boys at the Finca
overview: In part two of the Viva Ibiza! series, a cast of beautiful boys comes to the finca (Spanish for resort or little estate) to enjoy the wonders Ibiza have has to offer. Sexy Boys at the Finca is filled with gorgeous young German boys on vacation at a private Ibiza resort who spend their days swimming, sunning, sucking and fucking each other to creamy loads.  After watching the boys at the finca, you'll know exactly where you'll want to spend your next vacation. Consider the series your personal postcards that say, 'Wish you were here!
title: Viva Ibiza! 2 : Sexy Boys at the Finca
